secondaries.shortDescription: Psychic action. Once per objective, 3pts. Warp of 4, increase +1 in every use.

subObjectives.description: Scry Futures in a new objective marker

secondaries.shortDescription: Action, 6" from your own deployment zone, (2pts) in no man's land, (4pts) in enemy's deployment. Rangers complete it at end of turn.
secondaries.scoringPhase: End of Turn (rangers) or Command Phase

subObjectives.description: Action completed in no man's land (6" from your deployment)

secondaries.shortDescription: Kill enemy unit with aspect warriors: melee (1pts), ranged (1pts),  melee and ranged with different aspects (2pts)

subObjectives.description: Kill one or more enemy units in melee by aspect warriors
Kill one or more enemy units with ranged weapon by aspect warriors
Kill enemy units in ranged and melee by different aspect warriors

secondaries.shortDescription: Win points equal to the round if [you have an unit in your webay gate and no enemies closeby] or [you control a selected objective out of deployment]

subObjectives.description: You control the selected objective OR you have an unit within 3" of a webay gate and no enemies within it
You control the selected objective OR you have an unit within 3" of a webay gate and no enemies within it
